#!/bin/bash
#
# @CreationTime
# 2022/3/15 ä¸‹åˆ16:45:20
# @Function
#
# @Usage
# @author Siu CURRENT_PATH=$(readlink -f "$(dirname "$0")") ## region å…¨å±€å‚æ•°ï¼šå½“æœ‰é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶è¦†ç›–æ—¶è¿™é‡Œçš„å‚æ•°æ— æ•ˆ
db_ip=$(hostname -I | awk '{gsub(/^\s+|\s+$/, "");print}')
# æ€»æŸ¥è¯¢çš„æ¬¡æ•° = min(client_queries_limit,client_num * run_times)
client_num=10
run_times=5
# å®˜æ–¹æ–‡æ¡£è¯´æ˜ï¼šLimit each client to approximately this number of queriesï¼Œå®é™…é™åˆ¶æ¯ä¸ª clientï¼Œè€Œæ˜¯é™åˆ¶æ€»æŸ¥è¯¢æ•°
client_queries_limit=10
db_schema='ssb'
db_user='root'
db_port='9030' # é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶
conf_file="${CURRENT_PATH}"/config/conf
# jobs
jobs_path="${CURRENT_PATH}"/config/jobs
cmd_input=""
## endregion ## è®°å½•æ—¥å¿—
logFmt() { date_str=$(date "+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S.%3N") echo "$(hostname -s)" "${date_str}" "$1" # shellcheck disable=SC2086 echo "$(hostname -s)" "${date_str}" $1 >>"${archive_dir}"/run.log
} log() { echo "$1" # shellcheck disable=SC2086 echo $1 >>"${archive_dir}"/run.log
} runMss() { mysqlslap -u ${db_user} -P ${db_port} -h ${db_ip} \ --concurrency=${client_num} --iterations=${run_times} --number-of-queries=${client_queries_limit} --create-schema=${db_schema} \ --query=./"${archive_dir}"/"$1".sql \ --pre-query=./"${archive_dir}"/p_"$1".sql \ --csv=./"${archive_dir}"/"$1".csv tmp=$(cat ./"${archive_dir}"/"$1".csv) tmp1=$1${tmp} echo "$tmp1" >./"${archive_dir}"/"$1".csv res=$(cat ./"${archive_dir}"/"$1".csv) } runJob() { test_name=$1 query_sql=$2 pre_query=$3 echo "${query_sql}" >./"${archive_dir}"/"${test_name}".sql echo "${pre_query}" >./"${archive_dir}"/p_"${test_name}".sql log "=====================================================================================================================================" logFmt "æ‰§è¡Œæµ‹è¯•ï¼š${test_name} " logFmt "æ‰§è¡Œé¢„å¤„ç†ï¼š${pre_query}" logFmt "æ‰§è¡Œæµ‹è¯• SQLï¼š${query_sql}" runMss "${test_name}" logFmt "$1 æ‰§è¡Œå®Œæˆï¼š ${res}"
} runJobs() { if [ ! -d "${jobs_path}" ]; then logFmt "jobs è·¯å¾„ä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼š$jobs_path" help exit 1 else for file in "${jobs_path}"/*; do if test -f $file; then #log "åŠ è½½ï¼š$file" # shellcheck disable=SC1090 . "$file" test_name=$(basename "$file") runJob "${test_name}" "${query_sql}" "${pre_query}" fi if test -d "$file"; then logFmt "dir:$file" fi done fi } archiveRes() { # å½’æ¡£æµ‹è¯•ç»“æœ echo 'test_name,mode,avg,min,max,client_num,queries_per_client' >"${archive_dir}"/0.csv cat "${archive_dir}"/*.csv >"${archive_dir}"/result.csv rm -rf "${archive_dir}"/0.csv log "##########################################################################" log "æµ‹è¯•ç»“æœï¼š ${archive_dir}/result.csv " # shellcheck disable=SC2002 resFmt=$(cat "${archive_dir}"/result.csv | column -t -s,) log "${resFmt}" log "#########################################################################"
} main() { log "@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@ sqlæ€§èƒ½æµ‹è¯•å·¥å…· @@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@" logFmt "Options å‚æ•°ï¼š${cmd_input}" loadConf showArgs date_str=$(date "+%Y%m%d%H%M%S%3N") archive_dir=./output/test-"${date_str}" # åˆ›å»ºå½’æ¡£ç›®å½• mkdir -p "${archive_dir}" runJobs archiveRes
} showInfo() { echo """ ================================================ # sql æ€§èƒ½æµ‹è¯•å·¥å…· # # ç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼š 1.0.0 # # ä½œè€…ï¼š Siu # # Support Byï¼š mysqlslap # ================================================ """ help
} loadConf() { # shellcheck source=src/ # åŠ è½½é…ç½®å…¨å±€æ–‡ä»¶ if [ ! -f "${conf_file}" ]; then logFmt "é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ä¸å­˜åœ¨å°†ä½¿ç”¨é»˜è®¤é…ç½®æˆ–å‘½ä»¤è¡Œè¾“å…¥å‚æ•°:${conf_file}" else . "${conf_file}" # shellcheck disable=SC2027 logFmt "åŠ è½½é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ï¼š ${conf_file}" fi } showArgs() { log "###############################################################################" log "æµ‹è¯•å‚æ•°ï¼š" log "db_ip=${db_ip}" log "db_port=${db_port}" log "db_schema=${db_schema}" log "db_user=${db_user}" log "client_num=${client_num}" log "queries_limit=${client_queries_limit}" log "###############################################################################" } help() { echo """
Usage: ./run.sh -f ./myconfig/conf.file ./run.sh -j ./jobs ./run.sh -h 192.168.1.1 ./run.sh -p 9001 ./run.sh -u admin ./run.sh -P P@ssw0rd Options: -f é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶è·¯å¾„ï¼Œé»˜è®¤ï¼š./config/conf -j sql ä»»åŠ¡è·¯å¾„ï¼Œé»˜è®¤ï¼š./config/jobs -H æ•°æ®åº“IPï¼Œé»˜è®¤ï¼šæœ¬æœº IP -p æ•°æ®åº“ç«¯å£ï¼Œé»˜è®¤ï¼š9030 -s æ•°æ®åº“Schemaï¼Œé»˜è®¤ï¼šssb -u æ•°æ®åº“ç”¨æˆ·ï¼Œé»˜è®¤ï¼šroot -P æ•°æ®åº“å¯†ç ï¼Œé»˜è®¤ï¼šç©ºï¼ˆå½“å‰æœªåŠ å…¥Optionï¼‰ -c æµ‹è¯•å¹¶å‘æ•°ï¼Œé»˜è®¤ï¼š10 -q æ€»æŸ¥è¯¢æ¬¡æ•°ï¼Œé»˜è®¤ï¼š10 -h å¸®åŠ©ä¿¡æ¯ -v å·¥å…·ç‰ˆæœ¬ä¿¡æ¯ """
} #echo original parameters=[$@] # https://www.jianshu.com/p/6393259f0a13
#-oæˆ–--optionsé€‰é¡¹åé¢æ˜¯å¯æ¥å—çš„çŸ­é€‰é¡¹ï¼Œå¦‚ab:c::ï¼Œè¡¨ç¤ºå¯æ¥å—çš„çŸ­é€‰é¡¹ä¸º-a -b -cï¼Œ
#å…¶ä¸­-aé€‰é¡¹ä¸æ¥å‚æ•°ï¼Œ-bé€‰é¡¹åå¿…é¡»æ¥å‚æ•°ï¼Œ-cé€‰é¡¹çš„å‚æ•°ä¸ºå¯é€‰çš„
#-læˆ–--longé€‰é¡¹åé¢æ˜¯å¯æ¥å—çš„é•¿é€‰é¡¹ï¼Œç”¨é€—å·åˆ†å¼€ï¼Œå†’å·çš„æ„ä¹‰åŒçŸ­é€‰é¡¹ã€‚
#-né€‰é¡¹åæ¥é€‰é¡¹è§£æé”™è¯¯æ—¶æç¤ºçš„è„šæœ¬åå­—
#ARGS=$(getopt -o ab:c:: --long along,blong:,clong:: -n "$0" -- "$@")
ARGS=$(getopt -o vhf:j:H:p:u:c:q: -n "$0" -- "$@")
if [ $? != 0 ]; then logFmt "å‚æ•°é”™è¯¯ï¼Œé€€å‡º..." help exit 1
fi #echo ARGS=[$ARGS]
#å°†è§„èŒƒåŒ–åçš„å‘½ä»¤è¡Œå‚æ•°åˆ†é…è‡³ä½ç½®å‚æ•°ï¼ˆ$1,$2,...)
eval set -- "${ARGS}"
cmd_input=$(echo formatted parameters=[$@]) while true; do case "$1" in -v) showInfo exit 0 shift ;; -h) help exit 0 shift ;; -f) conf_file=$2 shift 2 ;; -j) jobs_path=$2 shift 2 ;; -H) db_ip=$2 shift 2 ;; -p) db_port=$2 shift 2 ;; -s) db_schema=$2 shift 2 ;; -u) db_user=$2 shift 2 ;; -c) client_num=$2 shift 2 ;; -q) #echo "option q:$2" client_queries_limit=$2 shift 2 ;; --) main shift break ;; *) help exit 1 ;; esac
done

90.body:
åœ¨lb-0å’Œlb-1ä¸Šåšå¦‚ä¸‹é…ç½®ï¼Œæ³¨æ„backendçš„æœåŠ¡åœ°å€ï¼š # HAProxy Configure /etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg
global log 127.0.0.1 local2 chroot /var/lib/haproxy pidfile /var/run/haproxy.pid maxconn 4000 user haproxy group haproxy daemon # turn on stats unix socket stats socket /var/lib/haproxy/stats
#---------------------------------------------------------------------
# common defaults that all the 'listen' and 'backend' sections will
# use if not designated in their block
#---------------------------------------------------------------------
defaults log global option httplog option dontlognull timeout connect 5000 timeout client 5000 timeout server 5000
#---------------------------------------------------------------------
# main frontend which proxys to the backends
#---------------------------------------------------------------------
frontend kube-apiserver bind *:6443 mode tcp option tcplog default_backend kube-apiserver
#---------------------------------------------------------------------
# round robin balancing between the various backends
#---------------------------------------------------------------------
backend kube-apiserver mode tcp option tcplog balance roundrobin default-server inter 10s downinter 5s rise 2 fall 2 slowstart 60s maxconn 250 maxqueue 256 weight 100 server kube-apiserver-1 192.168.5.141:6443 check server kube-apiserver-2 192.168.5.142:6443 check server kube-apiserver-3 192.168.5.143:6443 check
